front.title: Mail Transfer Protocol: ISI TOPS20 implementation

author.organization: University of Southern California (USC)/Information Sciences Institute
University of Southern California (USC)/Information Sciences Institute

abstract.t: We are creating an implementation of MTP for TOPS20. The programs are written in BLISS-10. This implementation supports the MTP user and server functions using both TCP and NCP transport services, and provides interfaces to other mail delivery mechanisms.
